title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Colin's Travel Nightmare, Aaron Rodgers' Personality Issue, CP3's Finals Flop
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Colin's Travel Nightmare, Aaron Rodgers' Personality Issue, CP3's Finals Flop
description:
The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. Colin's epic travel nightmare (0:50), and why a crazy Aaron Rodgers stat explains everything about his prickly personality (12:30). Suns legend and color analyst Eddie Johnson on Chris Paul's unpredictable future in Phoenix (21:40). Former NFL scout John Middlekauff on why Jon Gruden and the Raiders are in big trouble (25:00). Plus Marcus Thompson of The Athletic on why the Suns should be nervous despite having home court advantage in the Finals (29:50). Make sure to subscribe to the podcast and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
